attributes.action: listen to scientific advisors instead of sacking them for telling the truth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prof David Nutt said he was not prepared to "mislead" the public about the effects of drugs in order to convey a moral "message" on the government's behalf.
Earlier this week Prof Nutt used a lecture at King's College, London, to attack what he called the "artificial" separation of alcohol and tobacco from illegal drugs.
The professor said smoking cannabis created only a "relatively small risk" of psychotic illness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
